issue.title: PT-13884: Dynamic dictionary item name must be required.
issue.body:
## Description
fix: Dynamic dictionary item name must be required. Throw InvalidCollectionItemException if One or more items in the collection have a null or empty Name. API returns BadRequest. 

## References
### QA-test:
### Jira-link:
### Artifact URL:

commits.message: fix: Fix prevents from settingDynamicPropertyDictionaryItemEntity Name to null or empty. After update DynamicPropertyDictionaryItemEntity Name is required. Name with either Null or Empty value will be converted to unique id automatically.
